name: Vortex Monsters
description:
Play the game with sound by downloading it from the Google Play store here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Huuhuy.VortexMonsters

Vortex Monsters

Survive the onslaught. 

Use the keys W, S, A, D to move and click with the mouse to shoot.

Fight through waves of monsters from the stars and defeat the final boss to win the game.
